    • hasPrescription

      public boolean hasPrescription(String id)
      Checks if a prescription exists.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the prescription.
      Returns:
      True if the prescription exists, false otherwise.

    • createPrescription

      public Prescription createPrescription(String medicalName, int quantity)
      Creates a prescription. The prescription will not be created if: - The medicalName does not exist in the inventory. - The quantity is less than or equal to 0.
      Parameters:
      medicalName - The name of the medical item.
      quantity - The quantity of the item.
      Returns:
      The created prescription, or null if the prescription could not be created.

    • updatePrescription

      public boolean updatePrescription(String id, boolean isDispensed)
      Updates the prescription status. The status will not be updated if: - The prescription does not exist. - The stock of the item could not be updated (e.g., due to insufficient stock).
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the prescription.
      isDispensed - The status of the prescription.
      Returns:
      True if the status was updated, false otherwise.
